name: a2z
tagline: Homework archive for Programming from A2Z
body:
## Homework Archive for A2Z

### [1. Phyllotaxis Visualization](http://sagar-sm.github.io/az/w1.Phyllotaxis/)
A visualization made with @lmmccart's p5.js

### [2. Lord of the Rings Character Deleter](http://sagar-sm.github.io/az/w2.lotr/)
Ever found reading the original story a little boring during Frodo's parts? Cheers! Now you can delete him (and others as well).

### [3. Lord of the Rings Character Generator](http://sagar-sm.github.io/az/w3/)
Experimenting with context free grammar to generate random character name. **TODO:** Add Markov generation with seed text as character names.

## Author
Work by @sagar-sm. 
Based on the [Programming from A to Z](https://github.com/shiffman/Programming-from-A-to-Z-F14) class taught by @shiffman.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
